nodes.documentation: A Token Ranked List (TRL) enables voting with staked tokens periodically, over a registry of candidates*
nodes.name: TRL

nodes.documentation:
Initializes a new period, taking as the TTL value the current from storage, and setting the state to 1
Requires that the current period is Preparing (0)*
nodes.name: initPeriod

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializes a new period, taking as the TTL value the current from storage, and setting the state to 1
Requires that the current period is Preparing (0)*
nodes.name: initStages
buyTokenVotes
vote

nodes.documentation: @dev Claims the correspondant Bounty from the Pool on the current periodIndex*
nodes.name: claimBounty
calculateScoring

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the current period number, by calling the period Lib*
nodes.name: currentPeriod

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the current stage number, by calling the PeriodicStages lib*
